com.lib.pygmy

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lib.pygmy.Tile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a gameboard tile. This class stores both absolute position (in pixels), and relative position (relative to the board) of the tile.
    Author:
    Pygmy
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
